design.new.hero.title: How do you want to start?
design.new.hero.subtitle: Select a starting point for your seal. You can fine-tune every detail in the editor.
design.new.seo.title: Choose your starting point
design.new.seo.description: Pick the best workflow for your seal design and continue to the editor with guided setup.
design.new.filters.aria: Filter design starting points by use case
design.new.option.text.title: Type your text
design.new.option.text.description: Structured layout with grid, kerning, and engraving rules applied automatically.
design.new.option.upload.title: Upload an image
design.new.option.upload.description: Use an existing seal scan or artwork. We clean up edges and prepare it for engraving.
design.new.option.logo.title: Engrave a logo
design.new.option.logo.description: Import vector artwork for precision engraving with compliance checks.
design.new.feature.ai.title: AI-assisted layout
design.new.feature.ai.description: We align strokes, balance spacing, and preview drag adjustments instantly.
design.new.feature.templates.title: Template recommendations
design.new.feature.templates.description: Start from proven registrable templates tailored to your use case.
design.new.feature.compliance.title: Compliance guardrails
design.new.feature.compliance.descriptio: We flag contrast, size, and text issues before you send to production.
design.new.features.title: What you'll get in the editor
design.new.features.subtitle: Every workflow includes live preview, audit reports, and handoff-ready exports.
design.new.help.title: Need help choosing?
design.new.help.description: Watch the four-minute guided tour to see each mode in action.
design.new.help.label: Open tutorial
design.new.summary.empty: Select a design starting point to continue.
account.page.subtitle: Manage your identity, locale, and notification preferences for this workspace.
account.help.title: Need help?
account.help.body: Our CSM team can migrate approval policies or enable custom stamps for your workspace.
account.profile.subtitle: Share how your name should appear on approvals and exports.
account.profile.phone_hint: Used for SMS notifications and device approvals.
account.profile.avatar.label: Avatar
account.profile.avatar.help: Appears across approvals, exports, and device enrollment.
account.profile.error.name: Enter a display name.
account.prefs.heading: Communication preferences
account.prefs.title: Choose what reaches your inbox
account.prefs.subtitle: Mandatory alerts remain enabled even if you toggle other categories off.
account.prefs.product.desc: Roadmap notes, changelogs, and launch recaps.
account.prefs.digest.desc: Design completion stats and pending approvals.
account.prefs.security.desc: Login warnings, device approvals, and policy changes.
account.prefs.approvals.desc: Reminders when a stamp or seal awaits your review.
account.security.heading: Stay ahead of device hygiene
account.security.title: Harden your workspace
account.security.body: Enable passkeys or TOTP for every admin. We’ll walk you through enrollment and policy checks.
account.security.seo.title: Account · Security
account.security.seo.desc: Manage linked sign-in providers, enforce multi-factor authentication, and monitor active sessions.
account.security.banner.title: Unusual sign-in detected
account.security.banner.message: We signed you out of an unfamiliar device. Review sessions and revoke anything that looks off.
account.security.header.title: Keep your workspace locked down
account.security.header.subtitle: Review connected identity providers, enforce multi-factor, and monitor active sessions.
account.security.providers.title: Linked identity providers
account.security.providers.subtitle: Authorize SSO connections and revoke unused sign-in methods.
account.security.providers.help: Connections sync across the web app, mobile, and admin consoles.
account.security.provider.password.desc: Direct sign-in fallback. Required for recovery and offline access.
account.security.provider.google.desc: Authenticate with your corporate Google account.
account.security.modal.google.unlink.des: Users will need to re-consent before signing in with Google again.
account.security.modal.google.unlink.ste: All active Google sessions lose access within 60 seconds.
Ensure another login method is enabled before disconnecting.
account.security.modal.google.unlink.foo: The user stays signed in on devices using non-Google methods.
account.security.provider.microsoft.desc: Connect Azure AD or Entra ID tenants for SSO policies.
account.security.provider.microsoft.tool: Recommended for enforcing conditional access policies.
account.security.modal.microsoft.connect: Grant Hanko Field delegated permissions to access profile claims.
Sign in with a global admin
We request the User.Read and offline_access scopes to mint refresh tokens.
A secure window opens to Microsoft to finish app consent.
account.security.provider.line.desc: Allow crew members to authenticate with LINE Works accounts.
account.security.modal.line.disable.desc: Active sessions signed in with LINE Works will be revoked.
account.security.modal.line.disable.step: They can still sign in with other linked providers.
All tokens are recorded for compliance reviews.
account.security.mfa.title: Multi-factor authentication
account.security.mfa.description: Hanko Field requires multi-factor for workspace admins. Rotate recovery codes after onboarding new devices.
account.security.mfa.passkeys.desc: Use platform biometrics for seamless sign-ins on iOS and macOS.
account.security.mfa.totp.desc: Scanned with Authy on Haruka’s iPhone. Backup codes rotated monthly.
account.security.mfa.webauthn.desc: Enroll a FIDO2 security key for high-risk approvals.
account.security.modal.mfa.title: Manage multi-factor authentication
account.security.modal.mfa.desc: Scan the QR code below with your authenticator or enroll a passkey.
account.security.modal.mfa.step1.desc: Open your authenticator app and add a new account using the code on screen.
account.security.modal.mfa.step2.desc: Enter the first generated code to verify the device.
account.security.modal.mfa.footnote: Need help? Share the QR safely via secure messaging or regenerate a fresh secret.
account.security.mfa.backup_hint: Store offline and rotate after every device enrollment.
account.security.mfa.recovery.desc: We’ll send fallback codes to these contacts if you get locked out.
account.security.password.title: Password policy
account.security.password.description: Use a randomly generated password in your password manager. Required for SCIM or API usage.
account.security.sessions.title: Active sessions
account.security.sessions.subtitle: Sign out suspicious devices immediately to revoke access tokens.
account.sessions.title: Active devices
account.sessions.subtitle: Monitor sign-ins across browsers and native apps. Revoke anything unfamiliar.
account.sessions.footer: We notify you instantly when a new device signs in or when a session is revoked.
account.addresses.title: Shipping & billing addresses
account.addresses.subtitle: Control every location used in checkout, invoices, and library exports.
account.addresses.sync.title: Synced with checkout
account.addresses.sync.body: Updates here immediately refresh the checkout address list for your workspace.
account.addresses.empty.title: No saved addresses yet
account.addresses.empty.body: Add your studio, billing, or warehouse contacts to speed through checkout later.
account.addresses.table.label: Label
account.addresses.seo.title: Manage addresses
account.addresses.seo.desc: Manage shipping, billing, and pickup addresses synced with checkout.
account.addresses.modal.title: Save address
account.addresses.modal.subtitle: Addresses sync to checkout, invoices, and library exports.

account.orders.section.subtitle: Track fulfillment, download invoices, and revisit order status updates.
account.orders.support.title: Need help with an order?
account.orders.support.body: Visit the operations guide to learn about lead times, delivery expectations, and escalation paths.
account.orders.filters.placeholder: Search by order number, item, or destination
account.orders.empty.title: No orders yet
account.orders.empty.body: As soon as you place an order, it will appear here with real-time updates.
account.orders.seo.title: Account · Orders
account.orders.seo.desc: Review historical orders, monitor fulfillment stages, and download invoices.
account.order.tabs.summary.desc: Line items, addresses, and owner notes.
account.order.notes.kickoff.body: Ops confirmed signature order with leadership; requested expedited engraving for eight premium seals.
account.order.notes.qc.body: One hinoki seal required re-etching due to minor alignment variance. Resolved and re-run logged.
account.order.production.metric.stations: Engraving, lacquer, drying, QC, packing online. Finish pending.
account.order.production.metric.capacity: Facility running on green capacity for this batch.
account.order.production.metric.variance: QC re-run extended timeline; shipment still on track.
account.order.production.stream.engravin: Premium hinoki blocks acclimated for 12h to reduce moisture.
Kanji alignment validated against submitted CSV.
account.order.production.stream.kit.note: Awaiting QC go signal to start final packing.
account.order.production.timeline.design: DesignOps signed off on engraving template v4.1.
account.order.production.timeline.engrav: Hinoki blocks prepared; automated engraving workflows initiated.
account.order.production.timeline.qc_fla: Minor alignment issue flagged on unit 5; re-run started.
account.order.tracking.timeline.pickup.b: Yamato 10:30 JST pickup confirmed with dock team.
account.order.tracking.support: Carrier delays longer than 12h? Escalate to ops via the support drawer.
account.order.tracking.shipment.special: Hold at dock if receiving bay is occupied.
account.order.tracking.shipment.special_: Carrier pickup scheduled once QC clears remaining units.
account.order.invoice.document.label: Shipping label
account.order.invoice.timeline.generated: Revision 2 issued with QC adjustment noted.
account.order.invoice.timeline.sent.body: Email delivery confirmed for Naoki Fujimori and CC list.
account.order.invoice.message: Need a purchase certificate or customs document? Use the support button above with reference to this order.

account.order.seo.desc: Monitor fulfillment progress, payments, and documents for this order.
